verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H216>light<s%> and my <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> shall I <S%H3372>fear?<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H2416>life;<s%> of <S%H4310>whom<s%> shall I be <S%H6342>afraid?<s%>

When the <S%H7489>wicked,<s%> even my <S%H6862>enemies<s%> and my <S%H341>foes,<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> on me to <S%H398>eat<s%> up my <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fell.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> an <S%H4264>host<s%> should <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall not <S%H3372>fear:<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> should <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, in <S%H2063>this<s%> will I be <S%H982>confident.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> thing have I <S%H7592>desired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that will I <S%H1245>seek<s%> after; that I may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life,<s%> to <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H5278>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H1239>inquire<s%> in his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

For in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> he shall <S%H6845>hide<s%> me in his <S%H5520>pavilion:<s%> in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> of his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> shall he <S%H5641>hide<s%> me; he shall <S%H7311>set<s%> me up on a <S%H6697>rock.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> shall my <S%H7218>head<s%> be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up <S%H5921>above<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about me: therefore will I <S%H2076>offer<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8643>joy;<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> yes, I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> also on me, and <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
When you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> you my <S%H6440>face;<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you, Your <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will I <S%H1245>seek.<s%>

<S%H5641>Hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> far from me; <S%H5186>put<s%> not your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> in <S%H639>anger:<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H5833>help;<s%> <S%H5203>leave<s%> me not, <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me, O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me, then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H622>take<s%> me up.
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me your <S%H1870>way,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in a <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H734>path,<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> of my <S%H8324>enemies.<s%>

<S%H5414>Deliver<s%> me not over to the <S%H5315>will<s%> of my <S%H6862>enemies:<s%> for <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> are <S%H6965>risen<s%> up against me, and such as <S%H3307>breathe<s%> out <S%H2555>cruelty.<s%>
I had fainted, <S%H3884>unless<s%> I had <S%H539>believed<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H6960>Wait<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> be of good <S%H2388>courage,<s%> and he shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3820>heart:<s%> <S%H6960>wait,<s%> I say, on the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
